reviews.title: Very clean
reviews.text: We were hesitant about staying at a Super 8, but we were pleasantly surprised by what we found. The rooms were exceptionally clean. The continental breakfast was nice too - they had a decent selection (muffins, bagels, cereal, etc.) I definitely recommend this hotel.

"Pride of Super 8" Indeed, it is. Room is clean, bright and spacious and so is the lobby/common area. Breakfast is more than adequate. which included juices, hot beverages, bagel/toast, hot and cold cereal etc. There is fridge and microwave in room, so very convenient. The staff are very helpful. The 2 senior citizens at the front desk are very efficient, no problem at all. It is one of the better motor inns of any franchise I have ever stayed. Excellent value. Definitely will return if in the same area.
reviews.title: Excellent place to stay

reviews.text: Spent 1 night here on way to Virginia, very clean room, well back from the interstates and very quiet, friendly and efficient check in and out. King size bed had oversized pillows which were nice and very comfortable. Very good value for the money. Would stay there again if in the area.
reviews.title: Very nice place

reviews.text: Four of us shared 2 rooms for one night on October 7th. The place is very new, extremely clean and comfortable. Breakfast was very adequate and included with the room. The only downsides, which were relatively insignificant, were the man working the desk appeared to be a senior citizen and was somewhat slow with checkin; and our two rooms were at extreme opposite ends of the motel. But they were connected by a pleasant, indoor, carpeted hallway. We also noticed a coin laundry room which would be handy for longer stays. Overall, a great choice.
reviews.title: great stopover

reviews.text: Nothing fancy -- it's a Super 8, after all, not the Ritz -- but a clean (looked almost new), comfortable place right off the highway. Breakfast was available in the morning, but I got up a little later. Had good water pressure in the morning. Would return if I'm ever back in the area. Only hitch was, arriving at about 3 a.m., the computer had already marked me as a no-show, so it took the clerk several minutes to re-find me. Worked out fine, though.
reviews.title: Fine place

reviews.text: Busy truckstop area but the Super 8 is just sufficiently distanced from the truck park for comfort. Smartly maintained property, all the services work well, Good sized room, well equipped with fridge, microwave and hairdryer. Excellent modern, clean bathroom, in which they have installed those one-piece moulded bathtub/shower units, hence easy to keep clean, nowhere for mould to accumulate.
reviews.title: Super Super8

likes.liked: — Clean, smart, well equipped, everything works

reviews.text: Wifi is consistently good. Nice laundry room. Manager on front desk (Phyllis) says all their front desk staff have been with them since opening some years back. Staff seem happy in their work, are friendly and helpful. Breakfast is smartly presented, and regularly topped up.
reviews.title: Excellent place to stay

likes.liked: — super clean and good room layout

reviews.text: Overall, an excellent motel. I liked it so much I extended my stay to 3 days. If only all motels were this good...!
reviews.title: Dog-friendly Hotel

likes.liked: — first floor.. easy to find off rt 81

reviews.text: Super clean place...It had a hairdryer and a fridge and a microwave (which we never expected). The floor was super clean and the bathroom was well maintained. The beds were better than mine at home!!
reviews.title: Very enjoyable second visit.

likes.disliked: — lack of food variety within walking distance

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I'm giving this place 5 stars... first timer traveling with my dogs..so had no idea what to expect...Very friendly/ Very clean.. easy to find...first floor room...dogs permitted in the room...plus they had a very nice side yard to walk them at..
reviews.title: Thumbs Up for this motel

likes.liked: — Close to the highway, it was clean.

reviews.text: Spent one night here on the way to VA Beach. Check in was quick & easy. The room was clean & well maintained. The staff in the morning was very friendly. The breakfast selection wasn't the best, but hey it was free.
reviews.title: Clean & Friendly

reviews.text: paid 61.00 for a weekend night, great service, spacious room, has refrig, and microwave to meet food needs,
reviews.title: great little motel, has what you need and everything else nearby

likes.liked: — had everything we needed, and great service too

reviews.text: easy parking near room, handicapped access roll in if you need it,
reviews.title: Got layover

reviews.text: very friendly staff, 1/4 mile east is everything else you may want to do from all major eateries incl, outback, and ruby tuesday, and we suggest shoney seafood buffet on weekend.
reviews.title: Be sure to bring sleep mask & ear plugs

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: mall with movies and all major chain store such as penneys etc..... motel had what we needed as a couple for a evening on business trip.
reviews.title: Just like the reviewers said!!!
